landing.LandingMainMessage: The platform that connects drivers and cargo providers.
landing.LandingMainSubMessage: Choose a role as trucker or provider and start trucking!
landing.TrustworthyTruckersMessage: Our team is big! We count with great drivers to make sure your cargo gets to its destination safely and efficiently.
landing.EconomicSolutionsMessage: We work with a wide variety of trip offers for you to compare prices and select your company's best fit.
landing.ExploitReturnsMessage: Offer your truck's empty space and cash in on your trip's returns.
landing.NewLanding1: Browse the cargo that is available. Filter however is more convenient for you
landing.NewLanding2: Select the best cargo option for you
landing.NewLanding3: Select the cargo that you want to ship and send an offer
landing.NewLanding4: Wait for the cargo provider to confirm your offer. You can always modify it or send a counteroffer if you want
landing.NewLanding5: Once the order is confirmed, get in touch with the provider and ship the cargo
landing.CreateCustomSearch: Create a custom search according to your needs
landing.SelectBestTrip: Select the best trip for you
landing.SelectBestTripsOffer: Select the trip that best fits your needs and send an offer
landing.WaitForConfirmation: Wait for the trucker to confirm your offer. You can always modify it or send a counteroffer if you want
landing.GetInTouch: Once the trucker confirms your offer you can get in touch with him and wait for your cargo

myAlert.alertExplanation: An alert is a notification that will be sent to you when a cargo that matches your criteria is created.
myAlert.noAlert: You haven't created an alert yet

pastTrips.noPastTrips: You haven't completed any trips yet

manage.noOffers: No offers yet for this publication
